prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a unique pattern on its wings and a gentle demeanor.
Show me a Pokemon resembling a butterfly, but with vibrant purple and blue colors.
Imagine a mythical creature that can camouflage itself among flowers, featuring soft pastel colors.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with shimmering wings.
Design a creature that blends the traits of a moth and a butterfly, showcasing a beautiful gradient.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies elegance and grace, with large, delicate wings and a serene expression.
Make a unique bug-type Pokemon that has a striking resemblance to a Venomoth and lives in forests.
